<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Kofusachi (The Laughing God)](/Deities.aspx?ID=177)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Support local businesses, bring prosperity to your community, sample life's pleasures

**Anathema** Become tied to one location, judge another based on sexual desires or gender roles

**Follower Alignments**
NG, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12)

**Favored Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

**Domains** [Luck](/Domains.aspx?ID=18), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=30), [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=36)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291)

- **2nd**
[Hideous Laughter](/Spells.aspx?ID=150)

- **8th**
[Uncontrollable Dance](/Spells.aspx?ID=347)

</column>
name: Kofusachi (The Laughing God)
